General.Name: Kane Biotech Inc
General.Description: Kane Biotech Inc., a biotechnology company, engages in the research, development, and commercialization of technologies and products that prevent and remove microbial biofilms in Canada and internationally. The company develops pet oral care products under the StrixNB and bluestem brands; and animal and human wound care solutions under the DispersinB name. It also offers scalp care products under the DermaKB brand name; and wound care products under the Coactiv+ brand name, as well as other products under the goldstem, silkstem, Aledex, and DermaKB Biofilm brand names. Kane Biotech Inc. was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Winnipeg, Canada.
General.Address: 290-100 Innovation Drive, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R3T 6G2
